title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set but expression builder still shows the old column name when selecting the dataset.
description: Description: Set alias for columns in data set but expression builder still shows the old column name when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, it shows the old column name instead of the alias.
EB: The expression builder should show the alias of the column when selecting the dataset.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new data source and a dataset. 2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Select the dataset in the expression builder.
